alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 1:10AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northern Geauga... northeastern Cuyahoga...Lake...Ashtabula...Erie and northern Crawford Counties Until 245 AM EST.... At 108 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Willoughby to near Ashtabula to near Girard, moving south at 5 mph. Travel conditions are deteriorating along I-90. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Erie, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Willoughby, Eastlake, Corry, Edinboro, Geneva, North East, Union City, and Madison. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 313, 314, 315, 320, 326, 330, 331, and 332.
